name: Ferguson plc
description: Ferguson plc is a leading distributor of plumbing and heating products in North America and the UK, serving both residential and commercial markets. Founded in 1880 in the UK, Ferguson has grown to become one of the largest suppliers of plumbing and HVAC products, with a strong presence in the United States. The company operates through a network of over 1,400 locations, including branches and showrooms, providing customers with a vast selection of products including pipes, fittings, fixtures, and appliances. Ferguson is known for its commitment to providing exceptional customer service and expert advice, which has helped it build long-lasting relationships with contractors, builders, and other professionals in the industry. In addition to its distribution capabilities, Ferguson also offers a range of value-added services such as logistics, delivery, and project support. With a focus on innovation and sustainability, Ferguson continuously seeks to improve its product offerings and operational efficiencies, positioning itself as a leader in the plumbing and heating sector. The company is publicly traded on the London Stock Exchange and has expanded its footprint significantly in the North American market in recent years, reflecting its strategic vision to capitalize on growth opportunities in both residential and commercial construction sectors.
